name: Coin-Operated Hearts
description:
You do not feel like normal people do. The only way to open your heart is through coins. But even broken hearts know fear.

'Coin-Operated Hearts' is a tabletop roleplaying game for a storyteller and 2+ players. You will also need pens, paper and coins.

Content warning: This game is about depression and emotional trauma. It is not designed for happy endings. I hope you can find catharsis in it.

This download contains the base game ruleset and lore. Playable modules are TBA.
